name: NationalGrid
0:
”Alexa Ask National Grid how much do i owe”
”what is my balance”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: national grid
des: This skill allows National grid customers to inquire about the current billing telephone number without needing to access a website or other means. It is convenient way to always have the number handy. for National Grid billing or rate information. THIS SKILL IS NOT PROVIDED BY NATIONAL GRID
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
